label: Deliverable
title: Deliverable
find-a-bounty: Find a bounty to work on
make-ready-warning: If the deliverable is ready to be reviewed by curators, please mark it as so by using the "Make Ready for Review" button.

create.title: Create Deliverable
create.description: A deliverable is the work you have done to deliver what was asked by the bounty creator. By creating a deliverable you are indicating that you finished the work and it could be reviewed and proposed as solution by the curators.
create.description-type: Indicate the type of work you have done.
create.info-type: Provide a link to your work.
create.markdown-helper: Finding yourself lost with markdown language?

preview.error: Currently we do not support this embed
preview.video-error: Your browser does not support the video tag.

make-ready.title: Make ready for review
make-ready.error: Failed to make deliverable ready for review

errors.merge-conflicts: Deliverable has merge conflicts and can't be merged
errors.you-dont-have-deliverables: You don't have any Deliverables. Find a Bounty to work on.
errors.merge-commit: This proposal can't be merged because the repository don't allow "merge commits". Please contact the network governor.
errors.approval: Please contact repository admin for deliverable approval before merging is enabled.

infos.curators: In order to make a comment/review on this deliverable you need to be a curator,

make-ready.title: Make Ready for Review
make-ready.description: If the deliverable is ready to be reviewed by curators, please mark it as so.
make-ready.error: Failed to mark deliverable as ready.
